data.text: @JonoBullard And this why we're not going. As a single parent family with 2 teenagers my tickets this year are £139.60 more expensive this season than last. That's a 60% increase on my tickets! Wouldn't pay on principle.
@martinson5760 @JonoBullard I've cancelled everything... Its a piss take!
@Mike85Hill @JonoBullard Let's hope it's a one off to recuperate losses, if not its a worry as that will massively impact the league
@martinson5760 @JonoBullard They've got it very, very wrong! If they don't realise what they've done then it could impact club season ticket sales and renewals as well.

@Mike85Hill @JonoBullard I wish my pay did aswel but unfortunately due to covid the cost of living has gone through tge roof & it's affecting everything.  I just don't understand no concessions & family ticket. That's future fans
@martinson5760 @JonoBullard Wish my pay went up by 10% a year... 20% a year if you take the Early Bird price as a point of comparison 😉
@JonoBullard So if you didn't get the early bird you were paying £100 so in 2 years an extra £15-20 isn't too bad BUT not having options for families & concessions is disgraceful
